In order to evaluate if the Bcc growth inhibition by methylamine might be due to the alkalinisation of growth medium induced by methylamine aerial exposure, we used the strategy described in. We measured the pH of 1mL TYP liquid medium exposed to methylamine in the same conditions used for the MVIC test (Fig. 2). Before any methylamine treatment, the pH of liquid TYP was 6.7±0.1.
